DOC.brief_summary: The purpose preliminary substudy parent study `` Aerobic Exercise Intervention Knee Osteoarthritis '' determine repeatability reproducibility various measurement technique .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose preliminary substudy parent study `` Aerobic Exercise Intervention Knee Osteoarthritis '' determine repeatability reproducibility various measurement technique . The study enroll healthy volunteer . All participant receive x-ray MRI examination knee . Walking characteristic evaluate Motion Analysis Lab ; involve tap reflective marker participant ' skin walk level surface stair . All participant evaluate two time , 1-week period evaluation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Previous knee injury , knee pain , knee osteoarthritis
